contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 24, 2012 D SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Second Section)
SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest sewbba-blaenavon-contest-second-section
Workmen's Hall, Blaenavon Best Instrumentalist: Luke Jenkins (cornet) - Goodwick Prizes - 1st £350, 2nd £250, 3rd £150. 5 bands competed
Nov. 24, 2012, 6:31 p.m. July 1, 2020, 3:29 p.m.
1 Goodwick Brass Matthew Jenkins
2 Llwydcoed Band Tom Davoren
3 Crwbin Silver Band Colin Hogg
4 Briton Ferry Band Christian Jenkins
5 Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden
